content.prompt: The figure above shows the graph of a function f. Which of the following could be the second-degree Taylor polynomial for f about x = 2 ?

choices.label: 2 − x − x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BAC@

2 + x − x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BA1@

2 − ( x − 2 ) + ( x − 2 ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41A5@

2 + ( x − 2 ) − ( x − 2 ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41A5@

2 + ( x − 2 ) + ( x − 2 ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@419A@

topic.text: 10.11: (BC ONLY) Finding Taylor Polynomial Approximations of Functions

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
